attributes.additional_details:
Cash payouts of benefits (and other ridiculous benefits such a free laptops to those on benefits) should be ceased entirely and government run food/clothing halls created whereupon benefit claimants produce vouchers in order to obtain the essentials required simply to live.

This will increase the incentive for many to go out to work to better their standard of living as there is currently no incentive whatsoever - benefit claimants simply have it too good.

There are far too many individuals within Great Britain who feel that it is their right to not work whilst the rest of us go to work to pay for them and this has to stop as the British public are becoming increasingly incensed.

Why should those unwilling to work enjoy the same freedoms and priviledges of those of us that do. What is the incentive for those of us that do work.
